title: Resume/CV
description: Template for a standard resume or curriculum vitae (CV)

fields.title: Personal Information
fields.description: Basic information about the individual, Includes the individual's full name, contact information, and other identifying details

list.title: Objective Statement
list.description: A brief statement summarizing the individual's career goals

list.title: Work Experience
list.description: Details about the individual's past work experiences, Includes job title, company name, duration, responsibilities, and achievements

list.title: Education
list.description: Details about the individual's educational background, Includes degree, institution, years attended, and field of study

list.title: Skills
list.description: List of key skills the individual possesses,Includes both technical and soft skills
An assessment of the individual's key strengths and weaknesses, Includes characteristics, competencies, and areas for improvement
list.title: Strengths and Weaknesses
